subject: Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The free-agent first baseman Sean Casey completed an $800,000 contract with the Boston Red Sox to be their backup first baseman. Casey hit .296 with 4 homers and 54 R.B.I. in 143 games for Detroit last season.
